sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row class="d-flex justify-end align-center mt-1">
    <v-btn
      fab
      icon
      class="elevation-14 header__btn header__btn-login"
      @click="onClick"
    >
      <v-icon :size="iconsSize">
        mdi-login-variant
      </v-icon>
    </v-btn>
    <v-list v-if="visible" class="auth-btn__menu-list d-flex">
      <v-list-item
          class="auth-btn__menu-list__item d-flex align-center mx-1"
          v-for="(item, i) in items"
          :key="i"
      >
      <the-authorization-button-menu-item>
        {{item.title}}
      </the-authorization-button-menu-item>>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import TheAuthorizationButtonMenuItem
  from "@/components/heading/authrozationButtonMenu/TheAuthorizationButtonMenuItem.vue";
export default {
  name: "the-authorization-button-menu",
  components: [TheAuthorizationButtonMenuItem],
  props: ["iconsSize"],
  data: () => ({
    items: [
      {
        title: 'register',
      },
      {
        title: 'login',
      }
    ],
    visible: false
  }),
  methods: {
    onClick() {
      this.visible = !this.visible;
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
